languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Я говорю о ксеносах, Вольный Торговец. О роде {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g}, древнейших врагов Человечества. Самом жестоком и изощренном из их числа. Описание, данное Мастером вокса, соответствует тому, как выглядят их суда".

{n}Heinrix gives you a keen look.{/n} "I am talking about xenos, Rogue Trader. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's most ancient enemies. More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс внимательно смотрит на вас.{/n} "Я говорю о ксеносах, Вольный Торговец. О роде {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}эльдаров{/g}, древнейших врагов Человечества. Самом жестоком и изощренном из их числа. Описание, данное Мастером вокса, соответствует тому, как выглядят их суда".

More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."

{n}Heinrix gives you a keen look.{/n} "I am talking about xenos, Rogue Trader. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's most ancient enemies. More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."

languages.text: {n}海因里希以锐利的目光看了你一眼。{/n}“我指的是异形，行商浪人。他们是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}，是人类最古老的宿敌之一。更确切地说，我指的是艾达灵族之中最残忍、最狡猾的族群。他们飞船的风格与音阵大师的描述相符。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a keen look.{/n} "I am talking about xenos, Rogue Trader. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's most ancient enemies. More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希以锐利的目光看了你一眼。{/n}“我指的是异形，行商浪人。他们是{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}艾达灵族{/g}，是人类最古老的宿敌之一。更确切地说，我指的是艾达灵族之中最残忍、最狡猾的族群。他们飞船的风格与音阵大师的描述相符。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard perçant.{/n} « Je parle de xénos, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Plus précisément des plus cruels et des plus vicieux d'entre eux : les {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}, les plus anciens ennemis de l'humanité. L'apparence de leurs vaisseaux correspond à la description de la maîtresse-vox. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a keen look.{/n} "I am talking about xenos, Rogue Trader. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's most ancient enemies. More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard perçant.{/n} « Je parle de xénos, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Plus précisément des plus cruels et des plus vicieux d'entre eux : les {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldaris{/g}, les plus anciens ennemis de l'humanité. L'apparence de leurs vaisseaux correspond à la description de la maîtresse-vox. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente.{/n} «Estoy hablando de los xenos, Comerciante Independiente. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, unos de los enemigos más antiguos de la Humanidad. Concretamente, me refiero a la raza más cruel y astuta de su estirpe. El diseño de sus naves coincide con la descripción de la maestra de vocos».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a keen look.{/n} "I am talking about xenos, Rogue Trader. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's most ancient enemies. More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira fijamente.{/n} «Estoy hablando de los xenos, Comerciante Independiente. Los {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, unos de los enemigos más antiguos de la Humanidad. Concretamente, me refiero a la raza más cruel y astuta de su estirpe. El diseño de sus naves coincide con la descripción de la maestra de vocos».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは鋭い視線であなたを見た。{/n}「自由開拓者、我は異種族の話をしているのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}族は古くから人類の敵で、さらに、最も残酷で狡猾な種族です。彼らの船の特徴が、ヴォクス・マスターの説明と一致しています」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a keen look.{/n} "I am talking about xenos, Rogue Trader. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's most ancient enemies. More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは鋭い視線であなたを見た。{/n}「自由開拓者よ、私は異種族の話をしている。{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}族は古くから人類の敵で、さらに、最も残酷で狡猾な種族だ。彼らの船の特徴が、ヴォクス・マスターの説明と一致している」
{n}ハインリックスは鋭い視線であなたを見た。{/n}「自由開拓者、我は異種族の話をしているのです。{g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}アエルダリ{/g}族は古くから人類の敵で、さらに、最も残酷で狡猾な種族です。彼らの船の特徴が、ヴォクス・マスターの説明と一致しています」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen scharfen Blick zu.{/n} "Ich spreche von Xenos, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Von den {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, einem der ältesten Feinde der Menschheit. Genauer gesagt von den grausamsten und tückischsten ihrer Art. Das Aussehen ihrer Schiffe entspricht der Beschreibung der Voxmeisterin."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a keen look.{/n} "I am talking about xenos, Rogue Trader. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's most ancient enemies. More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix wirft dir einen scharfen Blick zu.{/n} "Ich spreche von Xenos, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Von den {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, einem der ältesten Feinde der Menschheit. Genauer gesagt von den grausamsten und tückischsten ihrer Art. Das Aussehen ihrer Schiffe entspricht der Beschreibung der Voxmeisterin."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, sana sert bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Zenolardan bahsediyorum Hür Tacir. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldariler{/g}, İnsanlığın en kadim düşmanlarından. Daha doğrusu, türlerinin en merhametsiz ve hilekâr olanlarını kastediyorum. Gemi tasarımları, Voks Üstadı'nın verdiği tanımla uyuşuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix gives you a keen look.{/n} "I am talking about xenos, Rogue Trader. The {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, one of Humanity's most ancient enemies. More specifically, I am referring to the most cruel and devious of their kind. The design of their ships matches the description provided by the Vox Master."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, sana sert bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Zenolardan bahsediyorum Hür Tacir. {g|Encyclopedia:Aeldari}Aeldari{/g}, İnsanlığın en eski düşmanlarından biri. Daha spesifik olarak türlerinin en merhametsiz ve hilekâr olanlarından bahsediyorum. Gemi tasarımları, Voks Üstadı'nın verdiği tanımla uyuşuyor."
